Articles.Content:
Today I am very proud no announce the Jetmaster Infini glide car!

No need for engines, this baby includes the latest in infini glide nanotechnology for astonishing results!

You\'ll never want to fly or drive the same way ever again! Drive and fly forever, buy the Jetmaster Infini glide car Today!

(emergency parachutes not included)

[http://youtu.be/Pc68sARkm4A](https://youtu.be/Pc68sARkm4A)

\*breaking news\*

With every model we do we normally we reserve a special edition just for Jebediah Kerman.

He has however allowed us to release it to the general public!

Also included is the Jetmaster Nike vertical launch scout aircraft! (put in the VAB!) (emergency parachutes not included)

Here is video of a modified version of the Nike that\'s a bit slower but includes a parachute. Flew it to KSP 2 in about 20min...

[http://youtu.be/cqegrbWOpwU](https://youtu.be/cqegrbWOpwU)

Yeah I noticed this weird physics while taxing my spaceplane on the ground.

What I didn\'t do however is build a single stage to orbit ornithopter, that\'s some impressive machine you\'ve created.

Why, Professor! The physics simulation has shown us an important discovery in the field of perpetual motion!

We must place effort into developing a real-world application immediately!

> 
> Yeah I noticed this weird physics while taxing my spaceplane on the ground.
> 
> What I didn\'t do however is build a single stage to orbit ornithopter, that\'s some impressive machine you\'ve created.

The infini glide car can not archive orbit, nor is it deep space certified. Day trips skipping out of the atmosphere is the most it can do... that and fly very very fast.

This is a bug feature that has powered many a rocket! When you use this on the rocket pad, you can create the ultimate turbine with only one engine. I\'m so glad they haven\'t fixed this yet! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
What\'s the max speed on the car?

The first one with just two fins I got up to 40-70m/s

The other car I got up to 1066m/s in a vertical climb

How to fly.

1. mash \'W\' and \'S\' until airborne

2. build up some speed until above 40m/s

3. .... ?

4. DO A BARREL ROLL!
Mach 3 at sea level w. the Nike. ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Nice physics. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Epic Epic. :-)

The First Rotating plane. ^^
